reviewText: I have had my Mom's On The Move DVD for about 3 years.  It is great if you are looking for a quick and EFFECTIVE work out.  It is also good on days when you may have a little extra time to do 2 of the segments back to back!  I would recommend this to everyone Beginner to the most in shape person because she shows modifications along with higher intensity versions of the same moves.
What a great workout!  Tracy does such a great job at motivating me to work harder.  I recommend this video for any mom who finds it more convenient to work out at home!

I bought this video directly from the star after taking one of her classes. I loved the diversity of the workouts and how she explains everything to you. It is a great video for moms, dads or anyone looking to get into shape.
